name: upcoming
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool csgo_matches_and_tournaments.
Tool description: 
API description: Fetches upcoming CS:GO matches data from the specified API endpoint.

content_type.description: The content type for the request, default is 'application/json'.

page.description: The page number to retrieve, default is 1.

limit.description: The number of matches to retrieve per page, default is 10.
